text: neohuiga eodie issdeon jug-eum-eun neohuileul dwittaleumae bilog nop-eun tab-wi e issdeolado machangajila eotteon haeng un-i geudeul-ege iss-eul ttae geudeul-eun malhagil igeos-eun hananim-eulobuteo on geos-imyeo tto eotteon bul-un-i geudeul-ege iss-eul ttae geudeul-i malhagil igeos-eun geudae ttaemun-ila hageoneul geudeul-ege il leogalodoe modeun geos-eun hananim-eulobuteo onila i modeun geos-eul ihaehajimushaneun geudeul-ui uidoneun mueos-inyo
